casebody.data:
The BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON
v.
Keyin T. WORTH et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 10, 2018 Keyin T. Worth, self-represented, in support of the petition. Christopher J. Picard, in opposition.

The named defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 40406) is denied.

MULLINS and KAHN, Js., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
